jd: Hi This is Bharath from Teamware solutions.Hope you are doing well.This email is regarding a job opportunity, Hope I reached the perfect candidate.______________________________________________________________________________________Below is the Job Description for your referenceCloud EngineerLas Vegas, NV/ Los AngelesOnsite - contract positionCloud Engineer will be responsible for driving and executing infrastructure design.driving and executing infrastructure design engagement for on-prem and cloud architecture using AWS.
